name: Endless_Horizons
description:
Endless_Horizons is a game where you play as a red cube dodging black cubes.

This game was heavily based on the game that Brackeys made in his how to make a game series on Youtube, i could not in good conscience release this game without making that abundantly clear... 

HOWEVER

i did put a lot of work and time into this game and if you are looking for something to do its worth at least 1 play through. 

This game is mainly an experiment and practice for me to get used to the Unity Engine so keep that in mind while playing it.

CONTROLS

A and D to move left and right

W and S to move up and down (later in game)

If you want to support me that tuff titys cause i'm not worth a cent, go support this guy instead

(Brackeys)

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYbK_tjZ2OrIZFBvU6CCMiA

Also feel free and reuse any of the music with this reference, commercial or otherwise

Music made by - Facyual
